TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UnmanagedMemoryStream extends System.IO.Stream

summary.span: 從 Managed 程式碼對 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊提供存取。

span.span: Provides access to unmanaged blocks of memory from managed code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別支援使用現有的資料流為基礎模型的 unmanaged 記憶體的存取權，而且不需要在 unmanaged 記憶體中的內容會複製到堆積。This class supports access to unmanaged memory using the existing stream-based model and does not require that the contents in the unmanaged memory be copied to the heap. [!INCLUDE[note_unnecessary_dispose](~/includes/note-unnecessary-dispose.md)] ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to read from and write to unmanaged memory using the class. 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊類別。A block of unmanaged memory is allocated and de-allocated using the class. [!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream/cs/sample.cs#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別，並依預設會設定屬性設`false`並屬性設`true`。This constructor creates a new instance of the class, and by default sets the property to `false` and the property to `true`. 屬性設定的值為`length`參數，且無法變更。The property is set to the value of the `length` parameter and cannot be changed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to read from and write to unmanaged memory using the class. 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊類別。A block of unmanaged memory is allocated and de-allocated using the class. [!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream_Example/cs/program.cs#00)]

summary.span: 使用指定的位置、記憶體長度、記憶體總數和檔案存取值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified location, memory length, total amount of memory, and file access values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `length`參數會定義目前的記憶體量中使用。The `length` parameter defines the current amount of memory in use. 如果讀取或將資料附加到資料流，`length`值應該等於要讀取的資料流中的有效資料數量，或保留。If reading or appending data to the stream, the `length` value should be equal to the amount of valid data in the stream to be read from or preserved. 如果寫入資料流，這個值應為零。If writing to the stream, this value should be zero. `capacity`參數表示的可用總記憶體量。The `capacity` parameter indicates the amount of total memory available. 這個值可以描述長度超過指定長度的區域，或表示您可以附加至的區域。This value can describe a region that is longer than the length specified, or indicate a region that can be appended to. 任何嘗試寫入超過此值將會失敗。Any attempt to write beyond this value will fail. `access`參數集，和屬性。The `access` parameter sets the , and properties. 請注意該指定不保證會寫入資料流。Note that specifying does not guarantee that the stream will be writable. 存取參數可讓實作者建立其實作可比對公開的實際資料流物件。The access parameters allow the implementer to create an object whose implementation can match the actual stream that is exposed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to read from and write to unmanaged memory using the class. 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊類別。A block of unmanaged memory is allocated and de-allocated using the class. [!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream/cs/sample.cs#1)]

exception.span: 使用者沒有所需要的使用權限。

summary.span: 取得資料流長度 (大小) 或指派給資料流的記憶體總量 (容量)。

span.span: Gets the stream length (size) or the total amount of memory assigned to a stream (capacity).
The size or capacity of the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`capacity`提供給建構函式的值。This property returns the `capacity` value provided to the constructor. 如果沒有`capacity`資料流初始化時指定的值，這個屬性會傳回資料流的長度。If no `capacity` value was specified when the stream was initialized, this property returns the stream length.

span.span: The stream is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);
override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 方法。This method invokes the method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊並，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

Public Overrides Sub Flush ()

override this.Flush : unit -> unit

summary.span: 覆寫 方法，以便不執行任何動作。

span.span: Overrides the method so that no action is performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行任何動作，但這個類別是包含基底類別。This method performs no action for this class but is included as part of the base class. 由於 RAM 寫入任何資料，這個方法是多餘的。Since any data is written to RAM, this method is redundant.

span.span: The stream is closed.

summary.span: 覆寫 方法，以取消指定的作業，但不執行其他任何動作。

span.span: Overrides the method so that the operation is cancelled if specified, but no other action is performed.

summary.span: 從 .NET Framework 4.6 開始可供使用

span.span: Available starting in .NET Framework 4.6

returns.span: 表示非同步排清作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未取消作業，呼叫方法，這表示不執行任何動作。If the operation isn't cancelled, the calls the method, which means that no action performed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a pointer to an unmanaged memory location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於建構函式。This method is equivalent to the constructor. 它支援需要初始化之前設定資料流變數的指標，因此，無法呼叫參數化建構函式的方法。It supports methods that need to initialize the pointer before setting stream variables and, therefore, cannot call the parameterized constructor. 這類方法應該使用預設建構函式初始化的指標，然後叫用方法。Such methods should use the default constructor, , initialize the pointer, and then invoke the method.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得資料流中資料的長度。

span.span: Gets the length of the data in a stream.
The length of the data in the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有變更，因為資料流已初始化，則這個屬性會傳回提供給建構函式的長度值。If unchanged since the stream was initialized, this property returns the length value provided to the constructor. 如果發生變更之資料流，此屬性會反映資料的長度的任何變更。If changes to the stream have occurred, this property reflects any changes to the length of the data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to read from and write to unmanaged memory using the class. 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊類別。A block of unmanaged memory is allocated and de-allocated using the class. summary.span: 取得或設定資料流中目前的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the current position in a stream.

value.span: 在資料流中的目前位置。

span.span: The current position in the stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化資料流時，這個屬性是設定為零。When a stream is initialized, this property is set to zero. 雖然您可以設定資料流的容量超過資料流的位置，您將無法存取該區域使用和方法。Although you can set the position of the stream beyond the stream's capacity, you will not be able to access that area using the and methods. 會傳回 0 並將會擲回。 will return 0 and will throw a . 這項支援主要是針對與基本的資料流作業的設計和程式碼相容性。This support is primarily for design and code compatibility with basic stream operations.

span.span: The stream is closed.

exception.span: 位置設為小於零的值，或位置大於 ，或加入目前的指標時導致溢位。

span.span: The position is set to a value that is less than zero, or the position is larger than or results in overflow when added to the current pointer.

summary.span: 依據資料流中的目前位置，取得或設定資料流的位元組指標。

span.span: Gets or sets a byte pointer to a stream based on the current position in the stream.
A byte pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要傳回整個資料流的指標，將屬性設為零，並接著呼叫這個屬性。To return a pointer to the entire stream, set the property to zero, and then call this property.

span.span: The current position is larger than the capacity of the stream.

exception.span: 正在設定的位置不是目前資料流中的有效位置。

span.span: The position is being set is not a valid position in the current stream.

exception.span: 正在將指標設為低於資料流起始位置的值。

span.span: The pointer is being set to a lower value than the starting position of the stream.

exception.span: 資料流已初始化，以搭配 使用。

span.span: The stream was initialized for use with a .

exception.span: 屬性只適用於以 指標初始化的資料流。

span.span: The property is valid only for streams that are initialized with a pointer.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含指定的位元組陣列，這個陣列具有介於 到 ( + - 1) 之間的值，已由讀取自目前來源的位元組所取代。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: offset
param.span: 中以零起始的位元組位移，即開始儲存讀取自目前資料流之資料的位置。

span.span: The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.

param.name: count
param.span: 自目前資料流讀取的最大位元組數。

span.span: The maximum number of bytes to read from the current stream.

summary.span: 將指定的位元組數讀入指定的陣列。

span.span: Reads the specified number of bytes into the specified array.

returns.span: 緩衝區所讀取的總位元組數。

span.span: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前無法取得足夠的位元組，則這個數目可能小於所要求的位元組數，如果已經到達資料流末端，則為零 (0)。

span.span: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `offset`參數會提供中的位元組位移`array`參數 （緩衝區索引） 中要開始讀取，而`count`參數會提供要從這個資料流讀取的位元組數目上限。The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in the `array` parameter (the buffer index) at which to begin reading, and the `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes to be read from this stream. 如果已到達資料流結尾，傳回的值會是位元組讀取，則為零的實際數目。The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached. 讀取的作業成功時，讀取的位元組數目進階資料流的目前位置。If the read operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read. 如果發生例外狀況，資料流的目前位置不變。If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged. 方法會傳回零，只有在到達資料流結尾之後。The method returns zero only after reaching the end of the stream. 否則，一律從資料流讀取至少一個位元組，再傳回。Otherwise, always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning. 沒有資料是否可用，從呼叫時，資料流，此方法將會封鎖直到至少一個位元組的資料可以傳回。If no data is available from the stream upon a call to , the method will block until at least one byte of data can be returned. 實作可以自由地傳回比要求更少個位元組，即使尚未達到資料流結尾。An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to read from and write to unmanaged memory using the class. 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊類別。A block of unmanaged memory is allocated and de-allocated using the class. [!code-csharp[System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.UnmanagedMemoryStream/cs/sample.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法傳回整數值，從資料流。Use this method to return integer values from the stream. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和寫入 unmanaged 的記憶體使用類別。The following code example demonstrates how to read from and write to unmanaged memory using the class. 配置和解除配置使用的 unmanaged 記憶體區塊類別。A block of unmanaged memory is allocated and de-allocated using the class. 在此範例中，物件會傳遞至方法，這個方法會檢查然後再嘗試讀取並對主控台顯示內容的屬性。In this example, an object is passed to a method which checks the property before attempting to read and display the contents to the console. span.span: Sets the length of a stream to a specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的值小於目前資料流的長度，則會截斷資料流。If the given value is less than the current length of the stream, the stream is truncated. 如果指定的值大於目前的資料流的長度，則會展開資料流。If the given value is larger than the current length of the stream, the stream is expanded. 如果資料流已展開，舊和新的長度之間的資料流的內容為未定義。If the stream is expanded, the contents of the stream between the old and the new lengths are undefined. 資料流必須支援寫入和搜尋的運作。A stream must support both writing and seeking for to work.
